attributes.action: take into consideration the revelations made by Channel Fours' programme The Global Warning Swindle Thursday 8/3/7
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This showed that co2 emmissions are not to blame for global warming and that its due to cosmic radiation and while we all need to look after our world we cannot alter the climate by our efforts.Therfore we should not penalise people or third world countries in wanting to improve their standard of living.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
